Title: The Seed of Doubt
Description:
The problem with the sha of doubt, $r, is its deceitful pervasiveness.

Once the seed of doubt is planted, it can grow like an unwelcome weed.

Such a seed has been planted in The Widow's Wail to the north, and like a weed, we must extinguish its presence immediately.

I need you to destroy the lingering fragment of doubt before it can infect any more victims.
